title: surfc
summary: Render a shaded surface with contour lines on the base plane.

gpu_support.notes: Single-precision gpuArray inputs stay on the device via the shared WebGPU renderer.

description: `surfc(X, Y, Z)` draws a shaded surface and overlays contour lines projected onto the XY plane. RunMat reuses the same surface renderer as `surf` and complements it with GPU-generated iso-lines.
gpu_behavior: Single-precision gpuArrays stream directly into the shared WebGPU renderer.
Double-precision data falls back to the CPU path until SHADER_F64 is available.
